name: Pyramania
overview: When the evil Pharaoh Bugenkamen died, his vast treasures were buried with him deep inside his pyramid. To prevent the marauding bands of looters from making off with his prized collection stolen from his many enemies, Bugenkamen insisted that the pyramid be booby trapped and guarded by all manner of evil beings. Can you overcome the curse he had placed on his final resting place? Can you overcome the obstacles in your path and retrieve the treasure? And can you get out alive?
